Articles.Content:
So i have this contract: Extract 1,250 units of Ore from the Mun.

[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/209hnbc.png[/IMG]

Im not clear if that has to be in one go, Would this work if i extract 300 units, convert it, re-fuel my orbitor, and repeat 5 times?

It looks like i could do that, but i dont want to go through all that effort if its wrong.

Hope you guys can help! :)

[quote name='Callmedave']It looks like i could do that, but i dont want to go through all that effort if its wrong. [/QUOTE]
I'm pretty sure that works. You won't even have to process it, you can just "Jettison Content" on the Ore tank.
